description: Details of Arboricultural Method Statement pursuant to condition 6 of planning permission ref: 244425HH dated 04/04/2025 for: Two storey rear extension to basement and ground floor; first floor rear infill extension; installation of a conservation style front rooflights and enlargement of conservation rooflights to side roofslope; installation of first floor side window; replacement of  existing windows, alterations to ground floor rear elevation of the existing outrigger, installation of first floor, flank window and ground floor window and door), solar pv panels on crown roof and installation of steps to rear garden (following  removal of staircase) and outbuilding (replacing existing shed)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
